title: Cariboo Signals
description: How do rural communities grow alongside technology? Daily conversations about responsible tech progress in the Cariboo region on the traditional territories of the Secwépemc, Tŝilhqot'in, and Dakelh nations.
copyright: © 2026 Erich Zirnhelt. Licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0.
author: Riley and Casey
subtitle: Technology and society in rural BC with Riley and Casey
summary: How do rural communities grow alongside technology? Daily conversations about responsible tech progress in the Cariboo region on the traditional territories of the Secwépemc, Tŝilhqot'in, and Dakelh nations. Riley brings tech systems thinking with rural roots, while Casey focuses on community development. New episodes every day with weekly themes.
territory_acknowledgment: The Cariboo region encompasses the traditional territories of the Secwépemc, Tŝilhqot'in, and Dakelh nations.
